question: What statue is located in the central square of Evgenia in Keratsini, Greece?
asked_question_translated: What statue is located in the central square of Evgenia in Keratsini, Greece?
answer: The statue located in the central square of Evgenia in Keratsini, Greece is the monument dedicated to the victims of the Mikrasiatiki Katastrophi (Asia Minor Catastrophe).
answer_translated_eng: The statue located in the central square of Evgenia in Keratsini, Greece is the monument dedicated to the victims of the Mikrasiatiki Katastrophi (Asia Minor Catastrophe).
